title: ðŸ›  Trouble Opening UKG from Okta? Here's How to Fix It
content: Whatâ€™s going on? Some users have had issues seeing a blank white screen when trying to open UKG through the Okta dashboard . Donâ€™t worry â€” this is a known issue and itâ€™s usually easy to fix. [Image] âœ… Quick Fix: Clear Your Chrome Cache The fastest and most reliable solution is to clear your Chrome cache for the past 7 days . Hereâ€™s how: Open Chrome. Click the three dots in the top-right corner. Go to Settings > Privacy and Security > Clear Browsing Data . Set the Time range to Last 7 days . Check the box for Cached images and files . Click Clear data . Close Chrome, reopen it, and try going into UKG through Okta again. This usually does the trick! Still not working? If itâ€™s still giving you trouble: Try opening the link in an Incognito window . Use another browser like Safari or Firefox . Or post in #digital-workplace so someone can help you out.
